results.title: Differential loss of fat in polycystic ovary syndrome: A welcome or warning sign?
results.text_hl: Based on these findings, a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@ was made.

results.title: SHORT syndrome in two Chinese girls: A case report and review of the literature
results.text_hl: She was noted to have partial @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@ as well as a peculiar face, looking considerably older than her age.

results.title: Effects of metformin or gemfibrozil on the lipodystrophy of HIV-infected patients receiving protease inhibitors.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@ of @DISEASE_HIV_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV-infected@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving protease inhibitors.

results.title: Adipokines in the HIV/HAART-associated lipodystrophy syndrome.
results.text_hl: This review article highlights recent evidence on @GENE_LEP @GENE_3952 @@@leptin@@@ replacement and compares @GENE_LEP @GENE_3952 @@@leptin@@@'s efficacy to that of other treatments, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@, on @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic abnormalities@@@ such as @DISEASE_Glucose_Metabolism_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D044882 @@@impaired insulin-glucose homeostasis@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving HAART.

results.title: Insulin resistance in HIV-related lipodystrophy.
results.text_hl: Treatment of @DISEASE_HIV_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@LD@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may ameliorate @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, but its impact on fat redistribution requires additional studies.

citations.NLM: Mikhail N. Insulin resistance in HIV-related lipodystrophy. Curr Hypertens Rep. 2003 Apr;5(2):117-21. PMID: 12642010

results.title: Sustained benefits of metformin therapy on markers of cardiovascular risk in human immunodeficiency virus-infected patients with fat redistribution and insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the metabolic and cardiovascular benefits of continued @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy for @DISEASE_HIV_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV-infected@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Hadigan C, Rabe J, Grinspoon S. Sustained benefits of metformin therapy on markers of cardiovascular risk in human immunodeficiency virus-infected patients with fat redistribution and insulin resistance. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2002 Oct;87(10):4611-5. PMID: 12364443

results.title: Comparison of rosiglitazone and metformin for treating HIV lipodystrophy: a randomized trial.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@PATIENTS@@@: 39 @DISEASE_HIV_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV-infected@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@. INTERVENTION: @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@Rosiglitazone@@@, 8 g/d, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, 2 g/d [DOSAGE ERROR CORRECTED] MEASUREMENTS: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ sensitivity estimated by the oral @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ tolerance test, subcutaneous and visceral abdominal fat measured by single-slice computed tomography, endothelial function measured by flow-mediated vasodilation, and fasting plasma measurements.

citations.NLM: van Wijk JP, de Koning EJ, Cabezas MC, op't Roodt J, Joven J, Rabelink TJ, Hoepelman AI. Comparison of rosiglitazone and metformin for treating HIV lipodystrophy: a randomized trial. Ann Intern Med. 2005 Sep 6;143(5):337-46. PMID: 16144892

results.title: Escape and lipodystrophy in acromegaly during pegvisomant therapy, a retrospective multicentre Spanish study.
results.text_hl: No relationship between escape and clinical variables was found, except prior CAB (P = 0 04) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (0 02) and grade of @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@ (P = 0 02).

results.title: Pharmacologic therapy for HIV-associated lipodystrophy.
results.text_hl: Recombinant @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @GENE_GH1 @GENE_2688 @@@growth hormone@@@ (rhGH) decreases VAT and buffalo hump, although it has been associated with a high frequency of adverse effects. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and the @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@ have favorable metabolic effects, but were not found to be effective in correcting body compositional changes associated with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008060 @@@lipodystrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Benavides S, Nahata MC. Pharmacologic therapy for HIV-associated lipodystrophy. Ann Pharmacother. 2004 Mar;38(3):448-57. PMID: 14755064
citations.BibTeX: @article{14755064, title={Pharmacologic therapy for HIV-associated lipodystrophy.}, author={Benavides S and Nahata MC}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={38}, number={3}, pages={448-57}}
